name: Submerged (itch) (Kate)
description:
Submerged is a hypertext story featuring lonely sea creatures on a quest for love. Follow Larry, an anxious octopus, throughout his night at the Octagon, a speed dating ring run by the local seahorse mafia.

This linear text game was developed throughout the course of the Pixelles Game Writing Incubator. Playing in Fullscreen is recommended and any feedback is appreciated.
